title: 'Harley Quinn' Season 5: How to Watch the Series From Anywhere
description: Watch out Superman, Harley's heading your way.
author: Kevin Lynch
excerpt: Watch out Superman, Harley's heading your way.
text: While Lady Gaga's recent take on the character in the Joker: Folie Ã  Deux live action movie may have divided opinion, the Harley Quinn show is still going strong, with a fifth season of the R-rated animated series about to hit streaming serviceÂ Max.Â Voiced by Kaley Cuoco, the titular anti-hero once again lines up alongside fellow anti-hero Poison Ivy (Lake Bell) and an assortment ofÂ villains and heroes from the DC Universe,.This time out there's a new location for Harley's adventures, with the baseball bat-wielding protagonist swapping the familiar gothic cityscape of Gotham for Metropolis -- the home of Superman, leading to encounters with Lex Luthor, his sister, Lena, plus DC fan-favorite Brainiac.Â Here's more on exactly when you can see the story continue, and why you may want to pair the show with a VPN.Read more: Don't Quit These Streaming Services Just Yet in January 2025How to Watch Harley Quinn season 5Season 5 of Harley Quinn is exclusive to streaming service Max in the US, with its first episode debuting on Thursday, Jan. 16. New episodes will release every Thursday from then on until the season finale on March 20.Seasons 1-4 of Harley Quinn, plus a Valentine's Day special are already available to watch on demand on the streamer.Gonna tell our kids this was Wicked. ðŸ’šðŸ’– #HarleyQuinn returns January 16, only on @StreamOnMax. pic.twitter.com/6jliCMcc2fâ€” Harley Quinn (@dcharleyquinn) December 20, 2024 James Martin/CNET Max Carries Harley Quinn If you're interested in watching Harley Quinn S5, now's a good time to subscribe to Max. Subscriptions cost $10 a month (with ads) or $17 a month (ad free). Want to watch in 4K? The Ultimate plan offers that feature and costs $21 a month. There's also theÂ Hulu, Disney Plus and Max megabundle: Ad-based version comes with a $17 monthly price tag, while the ad-free version is $30 a month. How to Watch Harley Quinn Season 5 with a VPNPerhaps you're traveling abroad and want to stream Max while away from home. With a VPN, you're able to virtually change your location on your phone, tablet or laptop to get access to the series from anywhere in the world. There are other good reasons to use a VPN for streaming too.A VPN is the best way to encrypt your traffic to stop your ISP from throttling your speeds. Using a VPN is also a great idea if you're traveling and find yourself connected to a Wi-Fi network and want to add an extra layer of privacy for your devices and logins. Streaming TV can be a bit smoother with a reliable, quality VPN that's passed our tests and security standards.You can use a VPN to stream content legally as long as VPNs are allowed in your country and you have a valid subscription to the streaming service you're using. The US and Canada are among the countries where VPNs are legal, but we advise against streaming or downloading content on illegal torrent sites. We recommend ExpressVPN, but you may opt for another provider from our best list, such as Surfshark or NordVPN.Â  James Martin/CNET Latest Tests DNS leaks detected, 25% speed loss in 2024 testsNetwork 3,000 plus servers in 105 countriesJurisdiction British Virgin Islands ExpressVPN isÂ our current best VPN pickÂ for people who want a reliable and safe VPN, and it works on a variety of devices. It's normally $13 a month, but you can save money with an annual plan.Â Note that ExpressVPN offers a 30-day money-back guarantee. 61% off with 2yr plan (+4 free months) Follow the VPN provider's instructions for installation, and choose the United States, where Harley Quinn season 5Â will be streaming on Max. Before you open the streaming app, make sure you're connected to your VPN using your selected region. If you want to stream Harley Quinn on more than one device, it's possible you'll need to configure each one to ensure you're signed in. Go to settings and check your network connections to verify you're logged in and connected to your VPN account. Now you're ready to open Max to stream.Â If you run into issues with streaming, first make sure your VPN is up and running on its encrypted IP address. Double-check that you've followed installation instructions correctly and that you've picked the right geographical area for viewing. If you still encounter connection problems, you may need to reboot your device. Close all apps and windows, restart your device and connect to your VPN first. Note that some streaming services have restrictions on VPN access.
html:
While Lady Gaga's recent take on the character in the Joker: Folie Ã  Deux live action movie may have divided opinion, the Harley Quinn show is still going strong, with a fifth season of the R-rated animated series about to hit streaming serviceÂ Max.Â 

Voiced by Kaley Cuoco, the titular anti-hero once again lines up alongside fellow anti-hero Poison Ivy (Lake Bell) and an assortment ofÂ villains and heroes from the DC Universe,.

This time out there's a new location for Harley's adventures, with the baseball bat-wielding protagonist swapping the familiar gothic cityscape of Gotham for Metropolis -- the home of Superman, leading to encounters with Lex Luthor, his sister, Lena, plus DC fan-favorite Brainiac.Â 

Here's more on exactly when you can see the story continue, and why you may want to pair the show with a VPN.

Read more: Don't Quit These Streaming Services Just Yet in January 2025

How to Watch Harley Quinn season 5

Season 5 of Harley Quinn is exclusive to streaming service Max in the US, with its first episode debuting on Thursday, Jan. 16. New episodes will release every Thursday from then on until the season finale on March 20.

Seasons 1-4 of Harley Quinn, plus a Valentine's Day special are already available to watch on demand on the streamer.

Max

Carries Harley Quinn

If you're interested in watching Harley Quinn S5, now's a good time to subscribe to Max. Subscriptions cost $10 a month (with ads) or $17 a month (ad free). Want to watch in 4K? The Ultimate plan offers that feature and costs $21 a month. There's also theÂ Hulu, Disney Plus and Max megabundle: Ad-based version comes with a $17 monthly price tag, while the ad-free version is $30 a month.

How to Watch Harley Quinn Season 5 with a VPN

Perhaps you're traveling abroad and want to stream Max while away from home. With a VPN, you're able to virtually change your location on your phone, tablet or laptop to get access to the series from anywhere in the world. There are other good reasons to use a VPN for streaming too.

A VPN is the best way to encrypt your traffic to stop your ISP from throttling your speeds. Using a VPN is also a great idea if you're traveling and find yourself connected to a Wi-Fi network and want to add an extra layer of privacy for your devices and logins. Streaming TV can be a bit smoother with a reliable, quality VPN that's passed our tests and security standards.

You can use a VPN to stream content legally as long as VPNs are allowed in your country and you have a valid subscription to the streaming service you're using. The US and Canada are among the countries where VPNs are legal, but we advise against streaming or downloading content on illegal torrent sites. We recommend ExpressVPN, but you may opt for another provider from our best list, such as Surfshark or NordVPN.Â 

Latest Tests DNS leaks detected, 25% speed loss in 2024 testsNetwork 3,000 plus servers in 105 countriesJurisdiction British Virgin Islands

ExpressVPN isÂ our current best VPN pickÂ for people who want a reliable and safe VPN, and it works on a variety of devices. It's normally $13 a month, but you can save money with an annual plan.Â 

Note that ExpressVPN offers a 30-day money-back guarantee.

61% off with 2yr plan (+4 free months)

Follow the VPN provider's instructions for installation, and choose the United States, where Harley Quinn season 5Â will be streaming on Max. Before you open the streaming app, make sure you're connected to your VPN using your selected region. If you want to stream Harley Quinn on more than one device, it's possible you'll need to configure each one to ensure you're signed in. Go to settings and check your network connections to verify you're logged in and connected to your VPN account. Now you're ready to open Max to stream.Â 

If you run into issues with streaming, first make sure your VPN is up and running on its encrypted IP address. Double-check that you've followed installation instructions correctly and that you've picked the right geographical area for viewing. If you still encounter connection problems, you may need to reboot your device. Close all apps and windows, restart your device and connect to your VPN first. Note that some streaming services have restrictions on VPN access.Â
